cinvestav.android.pki.utils
Class LogUtil

java.lang.Object
  cinvestav.android.pki.utils.LogUtil

public class LogUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility for wraps the loggin capabilities for the application, so this could be independent of the used logger

Since:
20/06/2012
